description: Stuffed with a delicious cream-cheese filling, these roasted mushrooms are perfect as both a starter or main, and they're vegetarian meaning no-one misses out!
name: Cream Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide breadcrumb mixture among mushroom cups, pressing gently to compact. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden and mushrooms are tender. Sprinkle with extra parsley and serve.
